CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The high current of 11.7 mA / cm^2 is obtained for PCDSeBT - based PSCs , to our knowledge , which is among the highest short - circuit current density ( J SC ) values obtained from a BHJ device consisting of PCDTBT derivatives and [6,6]-phenyl C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PCBM ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| PCDSeBT |
| PSCs (PCDSeBT-based) |
| BHJ device |
| PCDTBT derivatives |
| [6,6]-phenyl C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| PCDSeBT |
| PCDTBT derivatives |
| [6,6]-phenyl C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM) |

The "PCDSeBT-based PSCs" and "BHJ device" are not material names, but rather a type of device (PSC) and a category of materials (BHJ), respectively. Therefore, they are not included in the table.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The high current of 11.7 mA / cm^2 is obtained for PCDSeBT - based PSCs , to our knowledge , which is among the highest short - circuit current density ( J SC ) values obtained from a BHJ device consisting of PCDTBT derivatives and [6,6]-phenyl C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PCBM ).

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| high current of 11.7 mA / cm^2 |
| short-circuit current density (J SC) |
| for PCDSeBT - based PSCs |
| among the highest |
| obtained from a BHJ device |
| consisting of PCDTBT derivatives |
| and [6,6]-phenyl C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| high current density of 11.7 mA / cm^2 |
| short-circuit current density (J SC) |
| for PCDSeBT - based PSCs |
| obtained from a BHJ device |
| consisting of PCDTBT derivatives |
| and [6,6]-phenyl C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM) |

Note: I have removed "to our knowledge" and "among the highest" as they do not clearly refer to material properties.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The high current of 11.7 mA / cm^2 is obtained for PCDSeBT - based PSCs , to our knowledge , which is among the highest short - circuit current density ( J SC ) values obtained from a BHJ device consisting of PCDTBT derivatives and [6,6]-phenyl C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PCBM ).

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value            |
|--------------------------|
| high current of 11.7 mA / cm^2 |
| for PCDSeBT-based PSCs    |
| among the highest short-circuit current density (J SC) values |
| obtained from a BHJ device |
| consisting of PCDTBT derivatives and [6,6]-phenyl C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value            |
|--------------------------|
| high current density: 11.7 mA / cm^2 |
| for PCDSeBT-based PSCs    |
| among the highest short-circuit current density (J SC) values |
| obtained from a BHJ device consisting of PCDTBT derivatives and PCBM |

Note: I assumed that "current density" is a material property, and "high" modifies the value of the current density. If "high" is not considered a property value, then the table would look like this:

| Property Value            |
|--------------------------|
| current density: 11.7 mA / cm^2 |
| for PCDSeBT-based PSCs    |
| short-circuit current density (J SC) values |
| obtained from a BHJ device consisting of PCDTBT derivatives and PCBM |
